haefeleuser wrote:
> Now I expect that only a certain attribute is different between a1
> and a2. I don't want to retest all the attributes. So I want to test
> just the difference between a1 and a2 object graph.
>
> DiffResult dr = diff(a1, a2);
> String[] diffAttrib = dr.getDifferentAttributes();
> assertEquals(1, diffAtrib.size());
> Object newVal = dr.getNewValueForAttrib(diffAttrib[0]);
> assertEquals(2.5, newVal);
>
> Something like that. Does it exist so that I don't need to write a
> utility for this?
I don't know of such a tool.  One possibility would be to test using 
toString, as an easy way to examine the entire state of the object.  But 
I don't know if that would work for you.  Good luck,

    David Saff
